attributes.action: Allow medical cannabis to be regulated legally and recreational use
attributes.additional_details: If it was all legal it will knock the St dealers out pretty quickly as thr will b no need for a doorstep dealer. Less crime less criminal cases less money being spent from our purse. But our government likes to take our tax money n hey I think our country rite now could be doing with extra money. And 7 ministers have been doing a 7mnth research on legalising it and think have took it to parliament. Plz sign. It helps all sorts cancer.  alzheimers. Add add depression answer a could go on and on
attributes.background: Hi I am an add patient. Got put on the pills and had to discontinue taken thm as I lost 2 stone in 3 months. The only thing that keeps me good is cannabis. As well for my anxiety. But I'm spending £100/wk. And last 6 I've grew it myself as couldn't afford it. I stopped the cycle off crime by this
